Just curious, but how does Galvatron know of Halucigen's ability?

::Shredder/FZ::

Shredder nods, replying to Galvatron. "Allright, I'll get him out of there."

He slowly approaches, seeing a situation develop beyond the shields.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
FZ reaches for his wrist comp, but his hand stops in mid-reach, control no longer his. Zardus, through the Iron Fist, makes FZ retract his hand, clambering to his feet.

"That was a very nice preformance," FZ says as he looks down at Halucigen, having the autoguns stop firing, "I think your skills will be a welcome edition to the Alliance."
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Shredder swears, seeing Halucigen fall. He activates his comm.

"Galvatron, do you know if the Alliance are allied with anyone? I need some information to help our stupid friend here."





--- In nbwrpg@y..., aerosmith60@c... wrote:
>  Galvatron caught the fight with halucingen on his probe visual. "Shredder 
> get halucenagen back to the base. Help him get out of there he wont last 
> long. But dont let him grad your head and get inside your eyes....ill have 
> Guiledart work on something for that." he sent Guiledart instructions on what 
> do to and put his comm out. He turned to Dark Mouse. "Only knock out this 
> Maximal if possible. We have a chamber back at the base which will make her 
> destron or pred if you wish. That is why we dont usualy kill but capture and 
> ever increase our ranks."
